snippet: The unemployment rate for people under age 25 has fallen below 8 percent in Germany, even as it has approached 30 percent in the rest of the 17-nation euro zone. The difference between youth and adult unemployment rates is also smaller in Germany...
lead_paragraph: The unemployment rate for people under age 25 has fallen below 8 percent in Germany, even as it has approached 30 percent in the rest of the 17-nation euro zone. The difference between youth and adult unemployment rates is also smaller in Germany than in other countries.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: In Jobs for Young, Germany Stands Alone
headline.main: Off the Charts: In Jobs for Young, Germany Stands Alone
